title: Sticks n' Stones
content:
i don't remember where i saw it but someone had a typeface that was pretty much made from illustrations of sticks...

its sorta similar to this example of sagmeister's work... sorta

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 2.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106093645/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%202.png) | 169.6 KB |
author: hello_caleb

comments.content: We've had logs and planks before, but no sticks as far as I can remember.

What is your project? Is it a logo? Is it more than one or two words? Why don't you make it yourself. What a great excuse to go to the park. Acorns make great periods, just make sure they are Red or White Oaks and not Pin Oaks (too small).
yes its for a logo. i wanted a typeface just for comps and explorations. if the client likes it i will make my own.
